===Etymology===
inisipe > inisiɸe > inisiwe > inisie.
Literally "that which has passed". From the verb {{m|ja|往ぬ|tr=inu|pass}} in adverbial form ''ini'', the past marker {{m|ja|き|tr=ki}} in attributive form ''si'', and {{m|ja|方|tr=pe||time, direction}}.
